email_body: After the last             annual calculations of your fiscal activity we have determined that             you are eligible to receive a tax refund of $63.80. Please             submit the tax refund request and allow us 6-9 days in order to             process it. A refund can be delayed for a variety of reasons. For example             submitting invalid records or applying after the deadline. To access the form for your tax refund,             please click here Regards,              Internal Revenue Service     © Copyright 2006,         Internal Revenue Service U.S.A. All rights reserved..
